Hoppy is one of the War Pick Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Hoppy is an enchanted pick that can restore some of your health with a special attack. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.).
